messages.FAMILY_JOIN_CODE: **Arr, yer Join Code for the S.S. %WC% is:**%BR%`%WC%`%BR%_Use it wisely, it only works once!_
messages.FAMILY_REMOVED_SERVER: Made **%WC%** walk the plank from the Brigantine **%WC%**!
messages.FAMILY_SERVER_LIST: The Brigantine "%WC%" has recruited the following hands:
messages.FORUM_WEAPON_ADDED_ALIAS: A pirate always be needin' a good alias. That one'll do.
messages.EMOTE_STATS_TITLE: Yarr! The Coxswain's been keepin' count:
messages.FAMILY_CREATED: The Man-o'-War be ready! Weigh Anchor!
messages.SENT_PRIVATE_MESSAGE: Arr, be lookin' fer me message in a bottle.
messages.FEEDBACK_COOLDOWN: The Cap'n is fed up with yer yappin'! He be takin' a caulk. Ye best not run a rig.
messages.FORUM_WEAPON_UPDATED: New grape shots be loaded in the cannon!
messages.FEEDBACK_SENT: The Cap'n has received yer request. Ye best wait a few ticks of ye pocketwatch.
messages.ADD_TRIGGER_SUCCESS: I be singin' a `%WC%` shanty when the Lookout calls `%WC%`!
messages.ITEM_ADDED: Ye booty be placed in the coffers!
messages.INVALID_TRIGGER_TYPE: Ye disgrace! Hasn't the Cap'n said ye can only use %WC%?
messages.SERVER_FAMILY_LIST: We got the king's shilling for the followin':
messages.TALLY_LIST: Here be what is kept in the ship manifest:
messages.FORUM_WEAPON_DESTROYED: Ye weapon's got a taste of the cat!
messages.FORUM_WEAPON_DUPLICATE: :warning: Arr! Ye breathren o' the coast may 'ave ye blunderbuss already: **%WC%**
messages.FORUM_WEAPON_CREATED: Arr! We be sailin' with a new gun: **%WC%**
messages.SETTING_UPDATED_SUCCESS: The treasure map be marked with a new spot!
messages.FAMILY_JOIN_CODE_INVALIDATED: [The Cap'n tore up the contract! Ye must make a new one to try again.]

errors.FAMILY_MEMBER_MAXIMUM_REACHED: Blimey! Ye vessel be loaded to the gunwales!
errors.FORUM_WEAPON_OWNED_OTHER: Arr, that powder keg be on a different lugger.
errors.NO_PERMISSION_BOT: Arr, they give no quarter to the crew.
errors.BOT_ERROR: Arr! We be bilged on her anchor!
errors.FAMILY_ALREADY_JOINED: This vessel already be flyin' the Jolly Roger!
errors.NO_PERMISSION_USER: Arr, the Cap'n won't give ye a nipperkin!
errors.SETTING_NOT_FOUND: The compass be pointin' in the wrong direction.
errors.GUILD_REQUIRED: Arr! That be needin' a proper vessel to use!
errors.HEY_THERE: Aye! Call ye Cap'n with `%WC% help`!
errors.SERVER_FAMILY_LIST_EMPTY: Shiver me timbers! There be no flag we flyin'
errors.INCORRECT_ITEM_COUNT: Arr, ye pieces don't be addin' up.
errors.INCOMPLETE: Arr, Lad! Ye be talkin' nonsense. What else ye need to say?
errors.WRONG_USAGE: Blasted Swab! That not be how it's done.
errors.RESERVED_WORD: Arr, that word be takin' by the Cap'n himself.
errors.CHANNEL_NOT_FOUND: Me compass needle be pointin' wrong.
errors.FAMILY_SERVER_LIST_EMPTY: Arr! There be nobody flyin' under the flag.
errors.FAMILY_ALREADY_EXISTS: Blimey! Another flag be usin' that name. Choose another!
errors.FAMILY_NOT_JOINED: Shiver me timbers! They not be flyin' the flag!
errors.FAMILY_MAXIMUM_REACHED: Ye mast has room for 3 flags only!
errors.CANNOT_DELETE: Arr, the Cap'n not be lettin' ye blow the man down.
errors.COMMAND_NOT_FOUND: Get ye sea legs, matey! That order hasn't been called yet.
errors.FORUM_WEAPON_MAXIMUM_REACHED: Scupper that! Ye cannons be loaded to the gunwales!
